memberdef.definition: GyroAverageOperator< SplineRThetaBuilder, SplineRThetaEvaluator, IdxRangeRminorThetaBatch, ToLogicalCoordTransform >::GyroAverageOperator
memberdef.argsstring: (DConstFieldRminorTheta const &rho_L, SplineRThetaBuilder const &spline_builder, SplineRThetaEvaluator const &spline_evaluator, ToLogicalCoordTransform coordinate_transform, std::size_t const nb_gyro_points=8)
memberdef.name: GyroAverageOperator

parameterdescription.para: Field of Larmor radii on the (r, theta) grid.
The spline builder for the rtheta interpolation
The spline evaluator for the rtheta interpolation
Function to convert (R, Z) to (r, theta).
Number of points to use in the gyroaverage integration (default: 8).

memberdef.definition: void GyroAverageOperator< SplineRThetaBuilder, SplineRThetaEvaluator, IdxRangeRminorThetaBatch, ToLogicalCoordTransform >::operator()
memberdef.name: operator()

briefdescription.para: Applies the gyroaverage operator to a batched field.

detaileddescription.para: For each batch, and for each (r, theta) grid point, computes the gyroaverage by integrating the field along a circle of radius rho_L centred at (r, theta). The field is interpolated at off-grid points using 2D B-splines.

parameterdescription.para: Output field to store the gyroaveraged result (batched).

briefdescription.para: Operator to compute the gyroaverage of a field in (r, theta) coordinates.

detaileddescription.para: This class performs the gyroaveraging operation on a batched field defined on a polar grid (r, theta). The gyroaverage is computed by integrating the field over a set of points along a circle (the Larmor orbit) centred at each grid point, with radius given by the local Larmor radius field (rho_L).
The class uses 2D B-spline interpolation to evaluate the field at off-grid points along the orbit. The operation is performed in parallel over the (r, theta) grid.

parameterdescription.para: The type of the spline builder for the rtheta interpolation
The type of the spline evaluator for the rtheta interpolation
The index range over R, Theta and Batch directions.
Function to convert (R, Z) to (r, theta).
